title: Rose Gold Mangalsutra with CZ Pendant Charms
materials: Base metal alloy with Rose Gold plating
features: Delicate Mangalsutra featuring a series of floral pendant charms, each encrusted with sparkling Cubic Zirconia stones. The rose gold plating provides a modern and romantic touch to the traditional black bead design, giving it an elegant and refined look.
description: A modern take on a traditional symbol of marriage, this Mangalsutra offers a delicate and stylish design that blends seamlessly with contemporary fashion. The high-quality CZ stones provide brilliant sparkle, while the rose gold finish adds a touch of sophistication. It is a lightweight and comfortable piece, perfect for daily wear.
